Class NonogramMakerModel

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project5.models.NonogramMakerModel
public class NonogramMakerModel extends Object
Author:
iampo NonogramMakerModel class using 1D boolean[] array as logic for puzzle projection and

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    NonogramMakerModel(int row, int col)
    default constructor, creates a 1D array of grid cells, all false by default
    NonogramMakerModel(File file)
    reads file with specified format reads first line for dimensions of grid skips projection for row and columns reads grid, changing grid cell to true if "1" since all is false by default
    NonogramMakerModel(String filename)
    reads file, calls NonogramMakerModel(File file) constructor

      public NonogramMakerModel(File file) throws IOException
      reads file with specified format reads first line for dimensions of grid skips projection for row and columns reads grid, changing grid cell to true if "1" since all is false by default

      Throws:
      IOException - file does not follow specified format

    • project

      public static List<Integer> project(boolean[] cells)
      projecting nonogram numbers
      Parameters:
      cells - boolean[] grid
      Returns:
      projection of how many true values, numbers>1 means consecutive true values 0 is returned if no true is found i.e [1,1,4,1]

    • projectRow

      public List<Integer> projectRow(int r)
      projecting nonogram numbers in row
      Parameters:
      r - row
      Returns:
      projected true values in each row, returns 0 if none found i.e. [1,1,4,1]

    • projectCol

      public List<Integer> projectCol(int c)
      projecting nonogram numbers in column
      Parameters:
      c - column
      Returns:
      projected true values in each column, returns 0 if none found i.e. [1,1,4,1]

      public void saveToFile(String filename) throws IOException
      save file
      Parameters:
      filename - filepath
      Throws:
      IOException - invalid filepath

    • toString

      public String toString()
      returns String representation of dimensions, projected rows, projected columns, and the puzzle grid i.e. 3 3 0 0 1 0 0 1 000 000 001
